page.title: 03A Day In Our D-Block
page.content:
If I were spending a sunny day, in the{Callington}and{Golberdon}area I would get up in the morning and have breakfast.
Then I'd get dressed and go out to Majorettes for half an hour. I would come back and have a walk in the{wood} and on the way back home I would get some{shopping}for mum, dad, and me. After that I would go to the{river {beach}and sunbathe. I would cycle there. I would come back in time to cook lunch.Later I would go to the quarry.
After a while I would go picnicking at{Appledore Wood.}Then I'd come back and do lots of jobs for mum and dad. After I had done that the whole family would go to the{pub}and have tea out.
